title: Need Help! Game crashes right after champion select.
body: I'v never had problems out of league but some how I come back after a break and I  patched, found a game, chose my champ. just as I thought it was about to load it disconnected and gave me bug splat. I feel as if I'v tried it all and nothing has worked as of yet.

replies.body:
Bugsplats are usually an indication that there's something wrong with either your system drivers or your hardware. Following the steps in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) should assist you in resolving this.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
